institution_text: I have filled out the fields to the best of my knowledge, on behalf of our Head of RSE. I have answered the "SW Development" section based on provision of SW development to research groups via our "postdoc pool" arrangement (see https://www.bristol.ac.uk/acrc/research-software-engineering/software-howtos/how-to-fund-software/). In this setup, RSEs are costed onto grant-funded projects as specialist researchers and embedded with research teams. At the end of work on a project, they can be redeployed to another gran-funded project. The SW development service is therefore "bookable" with the granularity of research grants.
